attributes.action: Reduce Electricity & Gas Utility Bill Taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A significant portion of our utility bill in the region of 50% is made up of taxes. If Mr Brown really believes the rises are regrettable, he should address this issue immediately and reduce the tax burden. The purpose of this petition is for the utility bill payer to express their support for lower utility tax.
